Posts.Title: Worrying about mammogram Carolf1210 Carolf1210

Posts.Content: Carolf1210 wrote: This is what my mammogram said:  the presence of a small tightly grouped microcalcifications in the upper outer quadrant, approximately 10:30 position, 9 cm from the nipple. The calcifications are slightly pleomorphic and represent interval change. Biopsy is recommended.  RECOMMENDATION: Biopsy should be considered  BI-RADS CATEGORY: 4 Suspicious Abnormality Should I be worrying?  I go for a biopsy on Aug 11.  The waiting is terrible. Dx 8/2014, DCIS, Right, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
